title.rendered: Important Announcement: NMIMS NGASCE EXAM NOTIFICATION 2021-22

content.rendered:
For December 2021 exam cycle the Internal Assignment is made Live!

Assignment Question paper changes every exam cycle. Students need to refer to the latest uploaded & applicable Assignment Question paper, Internal Assignment Preparation & Submission guidelines which is available in the exam portal.

For December 2021 exam cycle: The last date for assignment submission is Saturday 27th November 2021 before 23.59 hrs (IST)

Please find below details for December 2021 exam cycle:

  • Exam registrations will go live on 10th Nov 2021 and will end on 24th Nov 2021.
  • Exam starts on 1st Dec, 2021 and ends on 2nd Jan,2022 as per slots defined (December- 2nd ,3rd ,4th ,5th, 8th ,9th, 10th,11th ,12th ,15th ,16th ,17th ,18th ,19th ,22nd ,23rd ,24th ,26th ,29th ,30th ,31st Dec and 2nd Jan’22)
  • Mode of the exam only online and not centre-based
  • Exam slots for Wednesday and Thursday will be 09:00AM and 05:00PM
  • Exam slots for Friday, Saturday and Sunday 09:00AM, 01:00PM and 05:00PM
  • Exam slots capacity for all slots will be 4,500
  • Students will have 30 mins to join any exam
  • Exam fee INR 600 per subject
  • Result declaration- 22nd Jan 2022 (Tentative)
  • Exam can only be booked from Laptop/Desktop and not on mobile application

Do you have any questions? See: NMIMS Exam FAQs
